languages.text: Only has an AoE attack. AoE attack costs -1AP less and deals no damage to allies.

traits.locale_text: Only has an AoE attack. AoE attack costs -1AP less and deals no damage to allies.

languages.text: The wielder can only perform area attacks with this weapon. These attacks cost −1 AP less and deal 0 damage to the wielder's allies.

languages.text: 使用者は、範囲攻撃しか行うことができない。これらの攻撃は消費APが1少なくなり、味方にはダメージを与えない。
languages.original_text: The wielder can only perform area attacks with this weapon. These attacks cost −1 AP less and deal 0 damage to the wielder's allies.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は、範囲攻撃しか行うことができない。これらの攻撃は消費APが1少なくなり、味方にはダメージを与えない。

languages.text: Персонаж может совершать этим оружием только атаки по области. Такие атаки требуют на 1 ОД меньше и наносят 0 урона союзникам.
languages.original_text: The wielder can only perform area attacks with this weapon. These attacks cost −1 AP less and deal 0 damage to the wielder's allies.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж может совершать этим оружием только атаки по области. Такие атаки требуют на 1 ОД меньше и наносят 0 урона союзникам.
Персонаж может совершать этим оружием только атаки по области. Такие атаки требуют на 1 ОД меньше и наносят 0 урона союзникам.

languages.text: El portador solo puede lanzar ataques de área con esta arma. Estos ataques cuestan −1 PA y no infligen daño a los aliados del portador.
languages.original_text: The wielder can only perform area attacks with this weapon. These attacks cost −1 AP less and deal 0 damage to the wielder's allies.

traits.locale_text: El portador solo puede lanzar ataques de área con esta arma. Estos ataques cuestan −1 PA y no infligen daño a los aliados del portador.

languages.text: 装备者只能使用这把武器进行范围攻击。范围攻击消耗的行动点数降低1点，且不会对装备者的盟友造成伤害。
languages.original_text: The wielder can only perform area attacks with this weapon. These attacks cost −1 AP less and deal 0 damage to the wielder's allies.

traits.locale_text: 装备者只能使用这把武器进行范围攻击。范围攻击消耗的行动点数降低1点，且不会对装备者的盟友造成伤害。

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, bu silahla yalnızca alan saldırıları gerçekleştirebilir. Bu saldırılar 1 EP daha az harcar ve kullanan kişinin dost birimlerine 0 hasar verir.
languages.original_text: The wielder can only perform area attacks with this weapon. These attacks cost −1 AP less and deal 0 damage to the wielder's allies.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi, bu silahla yalnızca alan saldırıları gerçekleştirebilir. Bu saldırılar 1 EP daha az harcar ve kullanan kişinin dost birimlerine 0 hasar verir.

languages.text: Le porteur de cette arme ne peut effectuer que des attaques de zone. Ces attaques coûtent 1 PA de moins et n'infligent aucun dégât aux alliés du porteur.
languages.original_text: The wielder can only perform area attacks with this weapon. These attacks cost −1 AP less and deal 0 damage to the wielder's allies.

traits.locale_text: Le porteur de cette arme ne peut effectuer que des attaques de zone. Ces attaques coûtent 1 PA de moins et n'infligent aucun dégât aux alliés du porteur.

languages.text: Der Träger kann mit dieser Waffe nur Flächenangriffe ausführen. Diese Angriffe kosten −1 AP weniger und fügen den Verbündeten des Trägers 0 Schaden zu.
languages.original_text: The wielder can only perform area attacks with this weapon. These attacks cost −1 AP less and deal 0 damage to the wielder's allies.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger kann mit dieser Waffe nur Flächenangriffe ausführen. Diese Angriffe kosten −1 AP weniger und fügen den Verbündeten des Trägers 0 Schaden zu.
